item.title: js calendar-componenets-survey
item.description: #Schedule Viewer Ubuntu 14.04 MEAN Stack (with Angular2.0) JobQueue : Celery(python) with MongoDB(Broker) (Optional) Vagrant Visualization graspSchedule.js DOJO [DOJO] (http://dojotoolkit.org/reference-guide/1.10/dojox/calendar.html) Demo fullcalandar Demo uikit UIKIT Bootstrap data visualization http://www.chartjs.org/ http://d3js.org/ http://sigmajs.org/ http://visjs.org/ https://plot.ly/javascript
